name: David Styrbjorn
title: Code Architecture & Gameplay
description: David is a fanatic when it comes to programming. Give him a problem and he will find a neat solution. He has a background in both web development, software development and gamedev and brings a strong foundation to the way new features are implemented into Atganga. His favorite item is Poison Dagger

name: Max Benecke
title: Gameplay Programmer & Design
description: Max has always had a passion for designing new experiences. Part of being a designer is finding the small nuances that elevates a game from decent to great. Atganga has been an incredibly exciting project for a game designer with so many moving components to create and curate. His favorite item is Buffet of Souls

name: Emil Bertholdsson
title: Gameplay Programmer & Visuals
description: Emil has a keen eye and a user focused mind that he uses to produce graphics and smart design solutions for Atganga. As the UI/UX Designer of the group he often spends his time making sure everything follows our cohesive style and is easy to interpret. His favorite item is Godly Aim.
